name: Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit
desc: Partner with Sam, Loyal Attendant Vigilance Whenever Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit attacks, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, the Ring tempts you. Then if Frodo is your Ring-bearer and the Ring has tempted you two or more times this game, draw a card.

name: Sam, Loyal Attendant
desc: Partner with Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Frodo into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with '{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.') Activated abilities of Foods you control cost {1} less to activate.

name: Bird of Paradise
desc: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Essence Warden
desc: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

name: Gilded Goose
desc: Flying. When Gilded Goose enters the battlefield, create a Food token (an artifact with '{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.'). {1}{G}, {T}: Create a Food token. {T}, Sacrifice a Food: Add one mana of any color.

name: Banquet Guests
desc: Affinity for Food (This spell costs 1 less to cast for each Food you control.) Trample Banquet Guests enters the battlefield with twice X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Sacrifice a Food: Banquet Guests gains indestructible until end of turn.

name: Farmer Cotton
desc: When Farmer Cotton enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 white Halfling creature tokens and X Food tokens. (They're artifacts with '{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.')

name: Feasting Hobbit
desc: Devour Food 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of Foods. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.) Creatures with power less than Feasting Hobbit's power can't block it.

name: Gollum, Obsessed Stalker
desc: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) At the beginning of your end step, each opponent dealt combat damage this game by a creature named Gollum, Obsessed Stalker loses life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

name: Pippin, Warden of Isengard
desc: Partner with Merry, Warden of Isengard (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Merry into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {1},{T} : Create a Food token. {T}, Sacrifice four Foods: Other creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Prize Pig
desc: Whenever you gain life, put that many ribbon counters on Prize Pig. Then if there are three or more ribbon counters on Prize Pig, remove those counters and untap it. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Prosperous Innkeeper
desc: When Prosperous Innkeeper enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with '{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.') Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

name: Shire Shirriff
desc: Vigilance When Shire Shirriff enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a token. When you do, exile target creature an opponent controls until Shire Shirriff leaves the battlefield.

name: Bilbo, Birthday Celebrant
desc: If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead. {2}{G}{1}{W}{1}{B}{1}{G},{T}, Exile Bilbo, Birthday Celebrant: Search your library for any number of creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only if you have 111 or more life.

name: Lobelia, Defender of Bag End
desc: When Lobelia enters the battlefield, look at the top card of each opponent's library and exile those cards face down. {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Choose one — • Until end of turn, you may play a card exiled with Lobelia without paying its mana cost. • Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Mentor of the Meek
desc: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Merry, Warden of Isengard
desc: Partner with Pippin, Warden of Isengard (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Pippin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever one or more artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink. This ability triggers only once each turn.

name: Rapacious Guest
desc: Menace Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Food token. Whenever you sacrifice a Food, put a +1/+1 counter on Rapacious Guest. When Rapacious Guest leaves the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to its power.

name: Rosie Cotton of South Lane
desc: When Rosie Cotton of South Lane enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with '{2}{G},{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.') Whenever you create a token, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control other than Rosie.

name: Savvy Hunter
desc: Whenever Savvy Hunter attacks or blocks, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with '{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.') Sacrifice two Foods: Draw a card.

name: The Gaffer
desc: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, draw a card.

name: Tireless Provisioner
desc: Whenever Tireless Provisioner enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Food, Clue, or Treasure token. (Food is an artifact with '{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.') {3}, {T}, Sacrifice three artifacts: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Butterbur, Bree Innkeeper
desc: At the beginning of your end step, if you don't control a Food, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with '{2}{G},{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.')

name: Mirkwood Bats
desc: Flying Whenever you create or sacrifice a token, each opponent loses 1 life.

name: Treebeard, Gracious Host
desc: Trample, ward {2} When Treebeard, Gracious Host enters the battlefield, create two Food tokens. Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on target Halfling or Treefolk.

name: Landroval, Horizon Witness
desc: Flying Whenever two or more creatures you control attack a player, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

name: Eagles of the North
desc: Flying When Eagles of the North enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn. Plainscycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Generous Ent
desc: Reach When Generous Ent enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with '{2}{G},{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.') Forestcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Great Oak Guardian
desc: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Reach When Great Oak Guardian enters the battlefield, creatures target player controls get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap them.

name: Orchard Strider
desc: When Orchard Strider enters the battlefield, create two Food tokens. (They're artifacts with '{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.') Basic landcycling  (, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Woodfall Primus
desc: Trample When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
